sentence: Mandela Barnes (D) leading that primary field with 23 percent support, with Milwaukee Bucks executive Alex Lasry trailing at 13 percent support, Outagamie County Executive Tom Nelson garnering five percent support and State Treasurer Sarah Godlewski three percent.
author: Julia Manchester
title: Democratic group runs ad hitting Ron Johnson over Trump 2017 tax bill

sentence: Rep. Val Demings of Florida, who is challenging Sen. Marco Rubio (R-Fla.), seemed to defend the Biden administration's move earlier this month, but her campaign said on Monday that until there is a plan to put more boots on the ground and support our law enforcement officers at the border, Chief Demings does not support lifting Title 42.? That leaves Tom Nelson of Wisconsin as an outlier.
title: More Dem Senate hopefuls split with Biden on border

sentence: Mandela Barnes is the Democratic frontrunner, while a pro-Bernie Sanders group is throwing its weight behind underdog Tom Nelson.
title: These 7 states will decide control of the Senate
